name: Oxeye Daisy
climate: Oxeye Daisies thrive in temperate climates with mild temperatures.
They can tolerate a range of climates but prefer not too hot summers.
Oxeye Daisies flourish in regions with distinct seasonal changes.
They are adaptable to varied climates, doing well in cool or warm zones.
sunlight: Oxeye Daisies love full sunlight and need at least 6 hours daily.
They are sun-loving plants flourishing best in bright, open areas.
Partial shade can be tolerated, but less sunlight affects blooming.
For optimal growth, ensure they receive direct sunlight regularly.
watering: Water Oxeye Daisies moderately, allowing soil to dry between watering.
They prefer moderate moisture but are drought-tolerant once established.
Ensure consistent watering during prolonged dry periods for best growth.
Avoid overwatering, which can lead to root rot and other issues.
soil: Well-draining soil is essential for healthy Oxeye Daisies growth.
They can grow in various soil types, including clay and sandy soils.
Fertile, well-aerated soil supports lush growth and abundant flowers.
Ensure soil has good drainage to prevent water-logging and root damage.
extra_care_tip: Deadhead spent flowers to encourage more blooms and prolong flowering.
Divide clumps every few years to maintain vigor and prevent over-crowding.
